name: liron-video-shop
description: Tinder-style video shopping app with admin panel

scripts.build:web: copyfiles -f index.html style.css script.js admin.html admin.js login.html manifest.json Favicon.png public
scripts.build:ios: npm run build:web && npx cap sync ios && npx cap open ios
scripts.build:android: npm run build:web && npx cap sync android && npx cap open android
scripts.cap:sync: npm run build:web && npx cap sync

author: Liron Shop
